__e: But if Drake's there, you should talk to him.
Mr. Drake doing anything he shouldn't?
So Mrs. Drake has been through this before, but talk her through it anyway.
All right. I knew where Drake was, and I came here straight as an arrow.
I want the Drake, and you're going to hand it over to me, or I'm going to--
Drake and I couldn't have done it without your help.
Sergeant Drake has heard the tale too, I see.
When Mr. Drake called, I told him...
The Drake killed your mother and now wants to kill you?
